testsuite.name: GET /auth/me

testcase.name: should return 401 AUTH_FAILED when authenticationProvider throws IllegalArgumentException
should return 401 AUTH_FAILED when Authorization header is missing
should return 401 AUTH_FAILED when SecurityContext has no current user
should authenticate from Authorization header, read current user from SecurityContext and return 200 + CurrentUserResponse
